title: Mountain City Murder
description: Meet Hannah Scrabble, bullheaded farmer, entrepreneur, skating teacher, spy thriller author and town snoop. It's 1978, and Hannah overhears a snippet of conversation in the park, setting her and her longsuffering suitor, Melvin Pearl, on the trail of a ruthless killer. To Hannah's surprise, their search also points to an unsolved mystery from her own past. Hannah will do just about anything to solve a mystery. If only she could figure out who holds the key to her heart. Available as Kindle and two print editions - regular and large print (18 pt.)
author: Marty Donnellan
